originalText.text:
I recently started taking my dog Winnie to Groomingdales on the Upper East Side, following a recommendation from my mom who used to take our family dog, Seger, there. From the very first visit, the experience has been nothing short of outstanding.

What stood out immediately was Marianneâ€™s remarkable memory and attention to detail. She not only remembered Seger from years ago, but she also extended the same warmth and exceptional care to Winnie. Itâ€™s rare to find a groomer who not only excels in their skill but also shows genuine love and understanding towards the animals.

The grooming services at Groomingdales are top-notch. Winnie came back looking adorable, well-groomed, and happy. The staffâ€™s professionalism, coupled with their evident passion for animals, makes this place a gem in the neighborhood.

Itâ€™s comforting to know that when I leave Winnie in their hands, sheâ€™s not just being groomed but is also receiving care from people who treat her like their own. Groomingdales has certainly earned my trust and a loyal customer in me. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a reliable and loving grooming experience for their pet.

5 stars for Groomingdales â€“ they truly understand and embody what pet care is all about!
